system.description:
A golden spear with the wings of the Garoda twining about it. It sings with a heavenly tune, like one sung by kinnara, and is perfectly weighted.

Effect: Your Combo Breaker Penalty becomes -1 Attack Teeth/-3 Attack Teeth instead of -2/-3.

Garoda Set (1/3): You are considered a Garoda Knight. You have 1 set Garoda Wings, which you can wear for 1 Beat. If you do, gain Garoda Flight x3, wherein you can teleport when you move or are moved.
